title: BMW - motor vehicles produced worldwide 2006 to 2016
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in thousand units, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012 to 2009.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2006.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013 to 2012.
gold: This timeline represents the motor vehicle production of BMW worldwide from 2006 through 2016 . Globally , the manufacturer of automobiles and motorcycles produced a little over 2.3 million vehicles in 2016 .
